metadata.name: Wild and Gonna Make It PFP
metadata.description:
The companion profile picture to the Wild and Gonna Make It digital painting. 

Designed to the used by the owner as an avatar for social media.

This NFT will be given to the initial owner of the corresponding digital painting NFT, but after that the two can be sold or given separately by the owner. 

Wild and Gonna Make It was originally created as a contest entry for the #BenjaminKato art competition.
